credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Sein oder Nichtsein [To Be or Not to Be]
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: On white background, a white egg painted with black strokes to indicate hair, eyes, and mustache of Adolf Hitler. The lower jaw is "cracked" off and replaced with dangling human legs in red and blue. Followed by inscription at bottom center: "Sein Oder Nicht Sein / Lustspiel einer Tragodie Regie Ernst Lubitsch / (To Be or Not to Be) Pradikat besonders wertvoll  Mit / Jack Benny  Carole Lombard  Felix Bressart  Robert Stack / Sig Ruman  u.v.a.  Eine Ernst Lubitsch Produktion der / Romaine Film   Verleih: Neue Filmkunst Walter Kirchner".
name: Poster
